TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit MissingManifestResourceException extends System.SystemException

summary.span: 如果主要組件沒有包含中性文化特性 (Culture) 的資源，且遺漏適當的附屬組件，所擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown if the main assembly does not contain the resources for the neutral culture, and an appropriate satellite assembly is missing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 桌面應用程式Desktop Apps 在桌面應用程式，擷取資源的嘗試會失敗，因為無法從特定組件載入的資源集中性文化特性時，會擲回。In desktop apps, is thrown when the attempt to retrieve a resource fails because the resource set for the neutral culture could not be loaded from a particular assembly. 當您嘗試擷取特定的資源時，會擲回例外狀況，但是它被因為無法載入資源集，而不是，尋找資源失敗。Although the exception is thrown when you try to retrieve a particular resource, it is caused by the failure to load the resource set rather than the failure to find the resource. > [!NOTE] > 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 處理 MissingManifestResourceException 例外狀況 」 一節類別主題。For additional information, see the "Handling a MissingManifestResourceException Exception" section in the class topic. 例外狀況的主要原因包括：The main causes of the exception include the following: - 資源集不被識別其完整名稱。The resource set is not identified by its fully qualified name. 例如，如果`baseName`參數在呼叫方法指定根名稱的資源集沒有命名空間，但是資源集指派命名空間時，它會儲存在組件中，呼叫方法擲回這個例外狀況。For example, if the `baseName` parameter in the call to the method specifies the root name of the resource set without a namespace, but the resource set is assigned a namespace when it is stored in its assembly, the call to the method throws this exception. 如果您有內嵌的.resources 檔，其中包含您可執行檔中的預設文化特性的資源，而且您的應用程式會擲回，您可以使用反映工具，例如來判斷資源的完整的名稱。If you have embedded the .resources file that contains the default culture's resources in your executable and your app is throwing a , you can use a reflection tool such as to determine the fully qualified name of the resource. 在 ILDasm，按兩下可執行檔的**資訊清單**標籤以開啟**資訊清單**視窗。In ILDasm, double click the executable's **MANIFEST** label to open the **MANIFEST** window. 資源會顯示為`.mresource`後外部組件參考和組件層級的自訂屬性的項目並列出。Resources appear as `.mresource` items and are listed after external assembly references and custom assembly-level attributes. 您也可以編譯下列簡單公用程式，可列出名稱做為命令列參數傳遞給它的組件中的內嵌資源的完整的名稱。You can also compile the following simple utility, which lists the fully qualified names of embedded resources in the assembly whose name is passed to it as a command-line parameter. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResourceManager.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcemanager.class/cs/resourcenames.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResourceManager.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcemanager.class/vb/resourcenames.vb#4)] - 您識別的資源集 （以及選擇性的命名空間） 的資源檔名稱和副檔名，而不是依命名空間和根檔案名稱本身。You identify the resource set by its resource file name (along with its optional namespace) and its file extension rather than by its namespace and root file name alone. 例如，如果名為中性文化特性的資源集會擲回這個例外狀況`GlobalResources`您提供的值`GlobalResources.resources`(而不是`GlobalResources`) 至`baseName`參數建構函式。For example, this exception is thrown if the neutral culture's resource set is named `GlobalResources` and you supply a value of `GlobalResources.resources` (instead of `GlobalResources`) to the `baseName` parameter of the constructor. - 找不到方法呼叫中已識別的特定文化特性的資源集，並無法載入後援資源集。The culture-specific resource set that is identified in a method call cannot be found, and the fallback resource set cannot be loaded. 例如，如果您建立英文 （美國） 和俄羅斯 （俄文） 文化特性的附屬組件，但您無法提供中性文化特性設定的資源，但是您的應用程式目前的文化特性是英文 （英國），會擲回這個例外狀況。For example, if you create satellite assemblies for the English (United States) and Russia (Russian) cultures but you fail to provide a resource set for the neutral culture, this exception is thrown if your app's current culture is English (Great Britain). 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_MISSINGMANIFESTRESOURCE，0x80131532 的值。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_MISSINGMANIFESTRESOURCE, which has the value 0x80131532. 使用預設的支援參考相等的實作。 uses the default implementation, which supports reference equality. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructors. > [!NOTE] > 我們建議您在主要組件中, 包含一組中性的資源，所以附屬組件無法使用時，您的應用程式將不會失敗。We recommend that you include a neutral set of resources in your main assembly, so your app won't fail if a satellite assembly is unavailable. ## [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 應用程式 Apps 不同於桌面應用程式部署中的附屬組件的當地語系化的資源，而且通常會將中性文化特性的資源儲存在主要組件[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]應用程式部署多個文化特性，包括中性文化特性，在單一的資源封裝資源索引 (.pri) 檔案。Unlike desktop apps, which deploy localized resources in satellite assemblies and typically store the resources of the neutral culture in the main assembly, [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps deploy resources for multiple cultures, including the neutral culture, in a single package resource index (.pri) file. 如此一來，在[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]應用程式中，如果找不到慣用文化特性的資源，就會擲回下的下列條件：As a result, in a [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] app, if resources for the preferred culture cannot be found, the is thrown under either of the following conditions: - 應用程式不包括產生的.pri 檔案或無法開啟產生的.pri 檔案。The app does not include a .pri file or the .pri file could not be opened. - 應用程式的.pri 檔案不包含資源，設定為給定的根名稱。The app's .pri file does not contain a resource set for the given root name.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 使用預設屬性，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with default properties.

param.name: message
param.span: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

span.span: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`。`null`.| ||`message`字串。The `message` string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed
Protected Sub New (info As SerializationInfo, context As StreamingContext)

param.name: info
param.span: 存放序列物件資料的物件。

span.span: The object that holds the serialized object data.

param.name: context
param.span: 關於例外狀況的來源或目的端的內容資訊。

span.span: The contextual information about the source or destination of the exception.

summary.span: 從序列化資料中，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from serialized data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception inner) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, inner As Exception)

param.name: message
param.span: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

span.span: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

param.name: inner
param.span: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 inner 參數不是 ，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外狀況的 區塊中引發。

span.span: If the inner parameter is not , the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||內部例外狀況參考。The inner exception reference.| ||錯誤訊息字串。The error message string.|
